about_the_game:
YOU WERE NEVER MEANT TO BE HERE.

ANLG_VOID is an immersive, atmospheric horror experience that plunges you into the ever-shifting, endless labyrinth of the Backrooms. Built in Unreal Engine 5.5, this game pushes the limits of scale, sound, and psychological horror to create a world where every flickering light, distant echo, and vanishing doorway fuels your paranoia. Inspired by the lore of the Backrooms Wiki, this is more than just another Backrooms game—it's a true-to-lore survival horror experience where reality distorts, environments shift, and something unknown lurks beyond the static.

A WORLD THAT DOESN'T WANT YOU HERE

Explore massive, intricately designed levels, each crafted for maximum tension and immersion. While the campaign follows a structured, atmospheric journey through some of the most infamous levels of the Backrooms, the scale remains staggering, with vast hallways, unsettling liminal spaces, and non-linear paths that blur the line between direction and disorientation.

Future multiplayer expansions will introduce procedural, ever-changing environments, but the campaign experience is a carefully designed descent into madness. Navigate the unknown, uncover cryptic clues, and survive the horrors that lurk within the void.

A GIFT BECOMES A NIGHTMARE

Play as James, an uncle trying to buy the perfect birthday present—a vintage VHS camera for his nephew's horror video obsession. When a subway train ride goes horrifically wrong, James finds himself trapped in the very phenomenon his nephew had tried to warn him about. Now, the camera has become part of him, transforming his vision into an analog nightmare that might be the key to his survival.

KEY FEATURES:

🔦 Authentic Backrooms Horror – Every texture, sound, and entity is crafted with deep respect for the Backrooms Wiki, ensuring a lore-accurate experience filled with cryptic clues and hidden terrors.

📹 Analog Horror Aesthetic – A fully realized VHS-inspired filter brings a retro, found-footage feel to the game, intensifying the horror of every flickering light and echoing footstep. (Toggle available for players who prefer a clean visual experience.)

🌎 Massive, Handcrafted Levels – Using cutting-edge World Partitioning and Nanite technology, ANLG_VOID delivers seamless, interconnected environments that feel vast and isolating, just like the Backrooms should.

👁️ Survival Through Observation – The Backrooms are not empty. Some entities hunt by sight, others by sound… and some, you may not even realize are watching. Learn, adapt, and survive.

🎲 Procedural and Handcrafted Terror – While core areas follow lore-accurate designs, procedural elements ensure that each journey into the void is unpredictable—you’ll never know exactly what waits around the corner. (More procedural generation will be introduced in future multiplayer updates.)

📜 A Personal Horror Story – Experience a gripping narrative about family, survival, and the price of understanding. As James searches for a way home to his nephew's birthday party, he'll encounter other survivors, face heartbreaking choices, and uncover the dark truth about why some people are drawn to the Backrooms.

🖥️ Optimized for Performance – Despite the scale, ANLG_VOID is carefully optimized, allowing players to experience high-fidelity horror on a range of hardware. DLSS/FSR support ensures smooth performance in vast, open environments.

You're alone. You're lost. And you're being watched.

content_descriptors.notes:
ANLG_VOID is a psychological horror experience that contains disturbing imagery, intense atmosphere, and themes of isolation and paranoia. This game includes:

Frequent unsettling environments with eerie sound design and a constant sense of dread.
Depictions of death and gore—players may witness graphic injuries, bloodstains, and the aftermath of violent encounters involving NPCs.
Moderate horror violence—while not combat-focused, encounters can lead to sudden chases, fatal consequences, and disturbing deaths.
Player choices may lead to NPC deaths, impacting the story and environment.
Strong language and profanity in character dialogue, notes, graffiti, and environmental storytelling.
Cryptic messages and environmental storytelling that hint at tragic past events and unsettling fates of previous wanderers.
Psychological terror and existential horror themes, which may be distressing to some players.
Mild alcohol consumption and non-descript drug use—certain areas may feature characters drinking or referencing substance use in a subtle, environmental storytelling manner.
No explicit sexual content.

This game is designed to unsettle and disturb through psychological horror, immersive sound design, and unpredictable encounters. Player discretion is advised.

name: ANLG_VOID

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 (8GB) / AMD RX 5700 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700K / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070 Ti / AMD RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: ANLG_VOID is an intense horror exploration game set in the endless, shifting labyrinth of the Backrooms. Built in Unreal Engine 5.5, it delivers an eerie, lore-accurate experience where flickering lights, distant echoes, and shifting hallways fuel your paranoia. You were never meant to be here.
